HelpBalloon.title: Separators
HelpBalloon.content:
If you store recipient data in a spreadsheet software such as Excel and save them in a csv file, data is usually separated by a semicolon. Other programs may use different separators. You can, however, specify a different separator in the drop-down list. The following characters are possible separators:

Character
Description

;

Semicolon

,

Comma

|

Vertical slash (bar)

Tab

Tabulator
